summary:
The NFL is a big deal in American sports, featuring 32 teams split into two conferences. Each team plays 17 games during the regular season, with the top seven from each conference advancing to the playoffs. The ultimate goal is to reach the Super Bowl, where the AFC and NFC champions battle for the title.

Formed in 1920, the NFL has a rich history. The Green Bay Packers are the most successful with 13 championships, while the New England Patriots and Pittsburgh Steelers share the Super Bowl record with six wins each. The Kansas City Chiefs are the current champions.
title: National Football League
